is a Japanese anime series by Nippon Animation. It is a part of the World Masterpiece Theater series. It consists of 51 episodes. It was aired on Fuji TV between January 12 and December 28, 1986. Animax ran the show again across Japan from February 2007.
It was based on the 1913 novel "Pollyanna" and 1915 sequel "Pollyanna Grows Up" by Eleanor H. Porter.
